body.bibl: Kessel, Grigory. “Die Syrische Manuskripttradition in Osmanischer Zeit / The Syriac Manuscript Tradition during the Ottoman Period.” In Ausstellungskatalog “Wunder Der Erschaffenen Dinge: Osmanische Manuskripte in Hamburger Sammlungen” / “Wonders of Creation: Ottoman Manuscripts from Hamburg Collections,” edited by Janina Karolewski and Yavuz Köse, 46–51.
